content: A father has 4 children. The oldest child likes to play soccer. The second oldest likes to read books. The third oldest enjoys painting. What does the youngest child like to do?

I'm here to help you with your question. Well, the thing is, in this particular setup, it's not specified what the youngest child likes to do. The information given only tells us about the interests of the three older children. So, based on the details provided, I'm afraid I can't tell you what the youngest child likes to do because it's not mentioned.
